post.description:
Upload a file to storage.

Args:
    file_type: Type of file (job_descriptions, resumes, scorecards, etc.)
    file: File to upload
    job_id: Optional job ID for job-related files
    current_user: Authenticated user
    storage: Storage service

get.description:
Download a file from storage.

Args:
    object_path: Full object path in storage
    current_user: Authenticated user
    storage: Storage service

List files in storage with filtering.

Args:
    file_type: Type of files to list
    job_id: Optional job ID filter
    limit: Maximum number of files to return
    current_user: Authenticated user
    storage: Storage service

delete.description:
Delete a file from storage.

Args:
    object_path: Full object path in storage
    current_user: Authenticated user
    storage: Storage service

get.description:
Generate a presigned URL for temporary file access.

Args:
    object_path: Full object path in storage
    expires_hours: URL expiration time in hours (default 1)
    current_user: Authenticated user
    storage: Storage service

post.description: Upload and process a single CV file.
Upload and process multiple CV files in batch.

get.description: List candidates for the organization with filtering.

schema.title: Response List Candidates Api V1 Candidates  Get

get.description: Get a specific candidate.
Get candidate's AI-extracted profile data.

put.description: Update candidate profile with user corrections.

get.description: List all documents for a candidate.

schema.title: Response List Candidate Documents Api V1 Candidates  Candidate Id  Documents Get

post.description: Reprocess a candidate's documents (e.g., after AI model improvements).

get.description: Check CV processing service health.

post.description:
Evaluate a single candidate against a job using the scorecard.

This endpoint implements the same evaluation logic as the CLI evaluate_candidate
command, providing evidence-based scoring, qualification tier assignment,
and comprehensive evaluation reports.

Evaluate multiple candidates against a job in batch mode.

This endpoint implements batch evaluation similar to the CLI batch_evaluate_candidates_async
command, with progress tracking and error handling.

get.description: Get detailed evaluation results by ID.
List evaluations with filtering and pagination.

post.description:
Create an advanced multi-criteria ranking with comprehensive analytics.

This endpoint implements sophisticated ranking algorithms that go far beyond
simple scoring, providing enterprise-grade decision support for hiring teams.

Features:
- Multi-dimensional weighted scoring
- Bias detection and mitigation
- Diversity analytics and promotion
- Risk assessment and hiring recommendations
- Interview planning and scheduling insights
- Audit trails and decision transparency

get.description:
Get detailed ranking information with comprehensive analytics.

Returns complete ranking data including candidate details, methodology
transparency, diversity analytics, and decision support insights.

List all rankings for a specific job with metadata.

Provides a summary view of all ranking exercises performed for a job,
including basic metrics and performance indicators.

schema.title: Response List Job Rankings Api V1 Rankings Jobs  Job Id  Get

post.description:
Create an advanced shortlist with interview planning capabilities.

Transforms ranking results into actionable shortlists with integrated
interview scheduling, stakeholder notifications, and progress tracking.

get.description:
Get advanced analytics for a specific ranking.

Provides deep insights including bias analysis, diversity metrics,
hiring risk assessment, and benchmarking data.

schema.title: Response Get Ranking Analytics Api V1 Rankings  Ranking Id  Analytics Get

get.description:
Generate comprehensive diversity analytics report.

Provides detailed diversity metrics, bias analysis, and recommendations
for improving inclusive hiring practices.

post.description:
Compare multiple rankings for benchmarking and analysis.

Enables hiring teams to compare different ranking approaches,
analyze the impact of criteria changes, and optimize hiring decisions.

get.description: Health check for ranking service.

Get comprehensive analytics overview for the organization.

Provides summary metrics, activity trends, performance data, and insights
for the specified time range.

Get detailed analytics for a specific job.

Returns hiring funnel metrics, conversion rates, time-to-hire data,
and candidate quality metrics for the job.

post.description:
Generate a custom report based on specified parameters.

Supports various report types including hiring overview, job analytics,
candidate pipeline, diversity reports, and more.

get.description:
Get a previously generated report by ID.

Returns report metadata and optionally the full report data.

List generated reports with optional filtering.

Returns a paginated list of reports for the organization.

get.description:
